lessons.japanese: 会合は９時きっかりに始まった。
lessons.english: The meeting began at nine o'clock sharp.

lessons.japanese: 我々の飛行機はきっかり定刻の６時に離陸した。
lessons.english: Our plane took off exactly on time at six.

lessons.japanese: 飛行機は十時きっかりに離陸した。
lessons.english: The plane took off at exactly ten o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 飛行機は１０時きっかりに離陸した。
lessons.english: The plane took off at exactly ten o'clock.

lessons.japanese: ケイトは５時きっかりに来た。
８時きっかりに、自分の部屋で朝食を食べたいんだ。
lessons.english: I'd like breakfast in my room at 8 sharp.

lessons.japanese: ７時にきっかりに必ずここにきなさい。
lessons.english: Don't fail to be here at 7 o'clock sharp.

lessons.japanese: ３時きっかりにここに来てください。
lessons.english: Please come here at 3 o'clock precisely.

lessons.japanese: 六時きっかりにここへ来なさい。
lessons.english: Come here at six, not before.

lessons.japanese: 六時きっかりにここへ来なさい。
lessons.english: Come here at exactly six o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 六時きっかりにここへ来なさい。
lessons.english: Come here at precisely six o'clock.

lessons.japanese: 六時きっかりにここへ来なさい。
lessons.english: Come here at six o'clock sharp.

lessons.japanese: 列車は５時きっかりに発車した。
lessons.english: The train left at five o'clock to the minute.
